comments:
Description:
Compatibility: attached report containing chart cannot be rendered

Steps to reproduce:
1. Render attached report with ReportRunner


Result:
May 15, 2006 11:32:52 AM org.eclipse.birt.chart.exception.ChartException logThis
SEVERE: Exception
org.eclipse.birt.chart.exception.ChartException: The DataSet bound to the chart returned no rows.
	at org.eclipse.birt.chart.reportitem.ChartReportItemPresentationImpl.onRowSets(ChartReportItemPresentationImpl.java:373)
	at org.eclipse.birt.report.engine.presentation.LocalizedEmitter.startExtendedContent(LocalizedEmitter.java:669)
	at org.eclipse.birt.report.engine.presentation.LocalizedEmitter.startForeign(LocalizedEmitter.java:439)
	at org.eclipse.birt.report.engine.presentation.WrappedEmitter.startForeign(WrappedEmitter.java:209)
	at org.eclipse.birt.report.engine.presentation.DefaultPaginationEmitter.startForeign(DefaultPaginationEmitter.java:488)
	at org.eclipse.birt.report.engine.executor.ExtendedItemExecutor.execute(ExtendedItemExecutor.java:103)
	at org.eclipse.birt.report.engine.executor.ReportExecutorVisitor.visitExtendedItem(ReportExecutorVisitor.java:83)
	at org.eclipse.birt.report.engine.ir.ExtendedItemDesign.accept(ExtendedItemDesign.java:30)
	at org.eclipse.birt.report.engine.executor.TableItemExecutor.accessRow(TableItemExecutor.java:618)
	at org.eclipse.birt.report.engine.executor.TableItemExecutor.accessTableBand(TableItemExecutor.java:506)
	at org.eclipse.birt.report.engine.executor.TableItemExecutor.accessDetail(TableItemExecutor.java:418)
	at org.eclipse.birt.report.engine.executor.ListingElementExecutor.accessQuery(ListingElementExecutor.java:130)
	at org.eclipse.birt.report.engine.executor.TableItemExecutor.execute(TableItemExecutor.java:151)
	at org.eclipse.birt.report.engine.executor.ReportExecutorVisitor.visitTableItem(ReportExecutorVisitor.java:205)
	at org.eclipse.birt.report.engine.ir.TableItemDesign.accept(TableItemDesign.java:69)
	at org.eclipse.birt.report.engine.executor.ReportExecutor.execute(ReportExecutor.java:129)
	at org.eclipse.birt.report.engine.executor.ReportExecutor.execute(ReportExecutor.java:89)
	at org.eclipse.birt.report.engine.api.impl.RunAndRenderTask.run(RunAndRenderTask.java:171)
	at org.eclipse.birt.report.engine.api.ReportRunner.runAndRenderReport(ReportRunner.java:238)
	at org.eclipse.birt.report.engine.api.ReportRunner.execute(ReportRunner.java:164)
	at org.eclipse.birt.report.engine.api.ReportRunner.main(ReportRunner.java:120)

Suggest setting as "Wont't fix".
The reason why attached report can't preview is chart item lacks for column binding.
According to engine's requirement, chart needs to have own column bindings when it inherits from container. So users must generate column binding for chart item.
for backward compatibility reason, old reports can still be previewed, even with no column bindings.
reassigning to engine team for further investigation, no rows is returned to the chart, so that's why it can't be rendered

1. the design's version is 3.2.1
2. table has column bindings,
3. chart has no column binding, has no dataset.

result:
as the version is 3.2.1 so the MODEL won't add bindings to the chart automatcially.
as the chart has no column binding, has no dataset, so engine will not create rowset for chart.

It seems that this design is created using a internal build. In that build, the chart designer doesn't create column binding correctly.

suggest to close this SCR.

Marked as invalid. Compatibility only will work with reports created with final 
release versions, not with internal builds.

traces.message: The DataSet bound to the chart returned no rows.
